name: Extend Attack
desc: Your Melee Attack Range is increased by 1 Space (or your Ranged Attack Range is increased by 5 Spaces) for the Attack check.
descSummary: Increase melee range by 1 or ranged by 5

name: Power Attack
desc: You deal +1 damage with the Attack. You can use this Maneuver multiple times.

name: Sweep Attack
desc: Choose 1 additional target within 1 Space of the original target that's within your Attack Range. Make 1 Attack Check against all targets. Attack Hit: The original target takes your Attack's damage, and each additional target Hit takes 1 damage of the same type.

name: Expose
desc: The target becomes Exposed (Attacks against it have ADV) against the next Attack made against it before the end of your next turn.

name: Hamstring
desc: The target is Slowed (every 1 Space you move costs an extra 1 Space of movement) until the end of your next turn.

name: Parry
desc: Trigger: When a creature you can see within 1 Space (including yourself) is targeted by an Attack against its PD. Reaction (Maneuver): (1 AP) You grant the target a +5 bonus to PD against this Attack.

name: Raise Shield
desc: Requires: You're wielding a shield. Trigger: A creature within 1 Space (including yourself) is targeted by an Attack against its PD. Reaction (Maneuver): (1 AP) Reduce the damage against the target by an amount equal to your Shield's PD bonus.
descSummary: Reduce damage by shield's PD bonus

name: Taunt
desc: Choose an enemy creature that can see or hear you within 5 Spaces. Make an Attack Check, Influence Check, or Intimidation Check (your choice) contested by the target's Mental Save. Contest Success: The target is Taunted (DisADV on Attacks against creatures other than you) by you on their next Attack. Full Taunt: You can spend an additional 1 AP to have the Taunted Condition last until the end of your next turn.
descSummary: Target gets DisADV vs others (optional +1 AP for duration)

name: Body Block
desc: Trigger: You are targeted by an Attack. Reaction (Maneuver): (1 AP) You reposition a creature Grappled by you to shield yourself from damage. Effect: You and the Grappled creature each take half the damage dealt by the attack. Aftermath: You can move the Grappled creature to any adjacent space immediately.

name: Restrain
desc: The target is Restrained until the Grapple ends. Target Options: On its turn, the target can spend 1 AP to end the Restrained condition but remains Grappled.

name: Throw
desc: Requires: The Grappled creature is your size or smaller. Maneuver: (1 AP) The target is thrown up to a number of spaces equal to Â½ of your Might, ending the Grappled condition. Additional Range: Add 1 extra space for every 5 points the target fails the Contest Check by.
